pages.title: Cold Biome Foraging
pages.text: Although usually quite freezing, many useful plants can be found hiding in the Frozen wastelands.

pages.title: Snow Yams
pages.text: Snow Yams can be found sprouting in snow.

pages.title: Winter Roots
pages.text: Winter Roots can be found underneath snow sometimes.

pages.title: Bitter Berries
pages.text: Bitter Berries can be found anywhere Podzol is spreading.

pages.title: Miner's Lettuce
pages.text: Miner's Lettuce can be found in Taiga Biomes.

pages.title: Holly
pages.text: Holly can be found in Taiga Biomes.

pages.title: Onions
pages.text: Onions can be found in growing on Mountains.

pages.title: Morel Mushrooms
pages.text: Morels can be found in Old Growth Forests near giant Spruce trees.

pages.title: Redwood Sorrel
pages.text: Redwood Sorrels can also be found in Old Growth Forests.
